ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
des: "Refreshing on a hot day, and not bad for you! In my opinion, this beverage tastes better than the over-priced commercial version."
ins: In a blender combine milk, water, orange juice concentrate, ice cubes, vanilla and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into three 12 oz glasses and enjoy with a straw.
